summary: ( GAO-22-105991 ) وصلة للنسخة باللغة العربية According to the U.N., the conflict in Yemen is one of the world's worst humanitarian crises. The U.S. has long-standing security relationships with Saudi Arabia and the UAE—2 primary actors in the conflict—and has sold them weapons. There have been reports of extensive civilian harm in Yemen. However, DOD has not reported and State could not provide evidence...
title: Yemen: State and DOD Need Better Information on Civilian Impacts of U.S. Military Support to Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates
